description: This Dart source file defines a repository class SampleRepository that provides CRUD operations (fetch, insert, delete, clear) for SampleItem objects, interacting with a local database through sqflite.

classes.name: SampleRepository
classes.description: A repository class providing CRUD operations for SampleItem objects, interfacing with a local database.

methods.name: fetchAll
methods.description: Fetches all SampleItem objects from the database, with optional limit.

methods.name: insert
methods.description: Inserts a new SampleItem with a given title into the database.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a SampleItem from the database by its id.

methods.name: clearAll
methods.description: Clears all entries from the database.
